Name: Live Empire 2
About the game: ‘Live Empire 2’ is a simulated cultivation game. Sign a platform and start live broadcast Let the anchor enhance his reputation through live broadcast, sign a better platform and gain more profits. Cultivate attributes to improve live broadcast effect Training anchors and improving attributes will play a bonus role in different live broadcasts, making your income from each live broadcast greater! Enhance goodwill through dating What should you do after earning money? Of course, it’s a date with your favorite girl. Dating more will improve her goodwill, unlock more dating places and trigger hidden plots. More surprises are waiting for you to discover! Dressing at will Another advantage of improving goodwill is that more clothes can be unlocked, which can be changed on the live broadcast or on the date.
Meta Title: Live Empire 2: Dec 8, 2021, Happy Max and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Live Empire 2? Check out the release date (Dec 8, 2021), developer insights from Happy Max, and a complete game summary.
